name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword, suitable for a beginner warrior.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge. The handle is made of wood and wrapped with leather for a better grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill while equipped.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A powerful sword enchanted with magical properties.
looks: The Enchanted Sword is a longsword made from a shiny, silver metal. It has a gemstone embedded in the hilt, glowing with a soft blue light. The blade is adorned with intricate runes.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielding.

special_effects.mana_leech: Absorbs a small portion of enemy mana with each successful hit.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A longsword made of steel, known for its durability and versatility in combat.
looks: The steel longsword has a blade length of about 90 cm, with a slight curve for better slashing and stabbing. The hilt is made of leather-wrapped steel, providing a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordmanship: Provides a bonus to Swordmanship skill when wielded.

name: Golden Crown
description: A majestic crown made of solid gold, fit for a king or queen.
looks: The golden crown is intricately designed with intricate patterns and embedded with sparkling gemstones. It has a rounded shape with small peaks and is adorned with engravings of royalty and power.

special_effects.royal_presense: Increases the wearer's charisma and luck when interacting with others.

name: Crystal Staff
description: A powerful staff crafted from a magical crystal
looks: The Crystal Staff is long and slender, with a crystal orb at the top. The crystal is transparent and emits a faint glow. The staff has intricate carvings along its length, depicting arcane symbols.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of offensive spells

name: Longsword
description: A classic longsword made for skilled swordsmen.
looks: The longsword features a double-edged blade that tapers to a pointed tip. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, with a cross guard to protect the hand.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when used.

name: Steel Greaves
description: A pair of steel leg guards that provide excellent protection.
looks: The steel greaves are made of solid steel plates, covering the shins and knees. They have adjustable straps to ensure a secure fit and are polished to a shiny finish.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable armor made from steel plates.
looks: The Steel Plate Armor consists of thick steel plates that cover the entire body, providing maximum protection. It has reinforced shoulder and elbow guards and a skirt-like extension for additional leg protection.

name: Silver Sword
description: A sharp and elegant sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword has a slender blade with a shiny silver finish. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with intricate engravings.

special_weapon_skils.swordmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordmanship skill when used.

name: Flamestrike Sword
description: A powerful sword imbued with the elemental power of fire.
looks: The Flamestrike Sword is a longsword with a blade that constantly flickers with flames. The hilt is made of obsidian and has intricate engravings of fire symbols.

special_weapon_skills.fire_burst: Allows the wielder to release a burst of fire, damaging enemies in a small area.

special_effects.ignite: Has a chance to ignite enemies, causing damage over time.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Leather Boots
description: A pair of sturdy leather boots that provide comfort and protection for the feet.
looks: The leather boots are made from durable brown leather. They have a sturdy sole and laces that can be tightened for a secure fit.

name: Inferno Blade
description: A fiery sword enchanted with the power of the inferno.
looks: The Inferno Blade is a longsword with a blade made of pure flames. It emits a constant heat and glows bright orange. The hilt is made of obsidian with intricate carvings of fire motifs.

special_weapon_skills.fire_sword: Grants a bonus to Fire Sword skill when wielded.

special_effects.ignite: Has a chance to ignite enemies on hit, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Steel Sword
description: A longsword made of steel, balanced for both cutting and thrusting attacks.
looks: The steel sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a length of about 90 cm. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip and has a simple crossguard for hand protection.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword that is capable of delivering powerful strikes.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and there is a crossguard to protect the hands.
